xml:
Lubion<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Supplementation of luteal phase during assisted reproductive technology (ART) treatment in women for whom vaginal preparations are inappropriate

By subcutaneous injection or by intramuscular injection

  • Adult

    25 mg once daily from day of oocyte retrieval up to week 12 of pregnancy.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
